dimensions.name: Cost
dimensions.description: Total budget for the HVAC preventive maintenance and repairs.

dimensions.name: Timeline
dimensions.description: Expected schedule for the completion of maintenance and repair services.

dimensions.name: Experience
dimensions.description: Contractor's track record in providing HVAC maintenance and repair services.

dimensions.name: Preventive Maintenance
dimensions.description: Quality and thoroughness of quarterly preventive maintenance inspections.

dimensions.name: Emergency Response
dimensions.description: Availability and efficiency of emergency repair services.

dimensions.name: Equipment Expertise
dimensions.description: Knowledge and experience with rooftop units and split systems.

dimensions.name: Parts Replacement
dimensions.description: Ability to handle minor parts replacement and manage major parts approval.
